text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the Lenovo Legion Y730 81HD001SUS 15.6" FHD IPS GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB VRAM i5-8300H 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Lenovo Legion Y730 81HD001SUS 15.6" FHD IPS GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB VRAM i5-8300H 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop!
